vn.tungdx.mediapicker.activities

类 MediaPickerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • vn.tungdx.mediapicker.activities.MediaPickerActivity
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FragmentHost, CropListener, MediaSelectedListener

    public class MediaPickerActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
implements MediaSelectedListener, CropListener, FragmentHost
    Use this activity for pickup photos or videos (media).

    How to use:

    • Step1: Open media picker:
      - If using in activity use: open(Activity, int, MediaOptions) or open(Activity, int)
      • - If using in fragment use: open(Fragment, int, MediaOptions) or open(Fragment, int)
    • Step2: Get out media that selected in Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) of activity or fragment that open media picker. Use getMediaItemSelected(Intent) to get out media list that selected.

      • Note: Videos or photos return back depends on MediaOptions passed to open(Activity, int, MediaOptions)

      • EXTRA_MEDIA_OPTIONS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_MEDIA_OPTIONS
        另请参阅:

      • EXTRA_MEDIA_SELECTED

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_MEDIA_SELECTED
        Intent extra included when return back data in Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) of activity or fragment that open media picker. Always return ArrayList of MediaItem. You must always check null and size of this list before handle your logic.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • getMediaItemSelected

        public static java.util.ArrayList<MediaItem> getMediaItemSelected(android.content.Intent intent)
        Get media item list selected from intent extra included in Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) of activity or fragment that open media picker.
        参数:
        intent - In Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) method of activity or fragment that open media picker.
        返回:
        Always return ArrayList of MediaItem. You must always check null and size of this list before handle your logic.
